about_the_game:
Make your way through the many race cars, wepons and tracks to claim victory among the greatest veg out crew racers there is. A top down racer with it's own blend of personality and style. Choose your racer, choose your weapon, buckle up and prepare to race through the Veg out World.

Boosters

All racing games are that much more fun with boosters!

Teleports

Don't miss those teleports, take advantage while boosting for even far greater advantage!

Mines and other dangers

Watch out for those mines! There's a lot of different weaponry and objects out there to hurt you too!

Turrets and bullets

Don't forget to dodge those turrets, bullets, mines, you name it. Watch every turn and action in case it's a fatal one!

Teleports gone wrong

Running behind a little? Make sure to take advantage of those teleports, shortcuts and what ever else can increase your changes of winning, but be precise about it or it ay backfire!



Watch those bullets
As mentioned earlier, there are lots of dangers. The amount of flying bullets, obstacles and other dangerous things is right infront of you!



Get out there and start those veg out engines!

Happy veg out crew!

name: Veg out Crew 2D Racer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: 1 GHz processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: integrted sound card or equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: 1 GHz processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: integrted sound card or equivalent

short_description: Make your way through the many race cars, wepons and tracks to claim victory among the greatest veg out crew racers there is. A top down racer with it's own blend of personality and style. Choose your racer, choose your weapon, buckle up and prepare to race through the Veg out World.
